summary: Kitchen manager with six years in BOH operations and over five years as a chef in fast-paced restaurant kitchens. Experienced in team leadership, staff management, high-volume production, inventory and food cost control, menu planning, and catering/events. Bilingual in English and Spanish; ServSafe certified; reliable, punctual, and customer-service oriented; hands-on leader skilled at training staff and thriving under pressure.

experience.title: Kitchen Manager / Catering and Events Chef
experience.description: Apportioned and served food to facility residents, employees, or patrons; checked quantity and quality of received products; cleaned and prepared foods for cooking or serving. Managed kitchen operations for high-volume, fast-paced fair concession; developed menu items for gluten-free and vegan diets; trained 23 staff; oversaw 8 cooks and 17 staff; managed Meal-on-Wheels operations for Saint Lucie County; ensured cleanliness and proper plating.

experience.title: Kitchen Manager / Executive Chef
experience.description: Checked in deliveries and signed off on products received; performed tableside food preparation; reduced waste and profit loss via FIFO; oversaw kitchen staff to meet production and service standards; maintained guest satisfaction by addressing needs and requests.

experience.title: Executive Chef
experience.description: Delivered exceptional dining experiences; ensured quality standards; coordinated orders with kitchen and service teams; advised on allergies and dietary needs; prepared diet-specific items; maintained knowledge of menu and ingredients; responded to guest feedback.

experience.title: Lead Line Cook
experience.description: Led kitchen staff during high-volume dinners; cooked across grills, fryers, and griddles; maintained sanitation and safety; assisted catering events and menu planning; planned menus according to dietary restrictions.

education.degree: Associate of Applied Science in Culinary Arts

education.school: Nutrition courses / Classes in Restaurant and Facility Operations / Coursework in Food and Beverage Operations / Serve Safe Management
